title: Education System: Marxist & Feminist Theories üë©‚Äçüè´ - A Level Sociology Learning & Revision
description:
Richard looks at Marxist and Feminist theories of education for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, he will look at what the two schools of thought are and how they differ. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam.

Click here for the full course, or visit this link: http://bit.ly/30id5tm
